casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Donald TURNER. No. 134P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of March 2008 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
